DayOne: That WOULD be crazy. Unless he was right. But big claims require big demonstrations; that\'s why Christians are big on Jesus\' resurrection. We think that coming back from the dead is a pretty good demonstration.

Now, it\'s fair to say 'That must be false because dead people don\'t come back.' But the thing is, we accept that to be the natural order - we say that in a miraculous event the natural order was defied.

Whether you believe it or not is a matter for faith (though there is some surprisingly strong evidence for it if you follow the history of the thing). However, the concept IS internally consistent.
